title: Salam OS Linux i386
description:
Salam OS 1.0 : Release announcement

We are proud to announce the release of  Salam OS 1.0 , a Ubuntu based distro shipping the 
LXDE Desktop. Our goal is to provide an easy  rock solid,lightweight and visually 
appealing distro.

System requirements:

- x86 processor 
- 384 MB RAM (640 MB recommended for a comfortable usage). 
- 6.4 GB of disk space(10 GB recommended) 
- Graphics card capable of 800Ãƒâ€”600 resolution 
- DVD drive or USB port

Release Info&Features:

1.Kernel 3.11
2.LXDE 
3.PCMAN File Manager 
4.KDE Window Manager 
5.A variety of applications
